steps.name: Given the user opens the "GESANODEB" function
And the user adds the lock entry "LCK_GESANODEB"
When the user clicks the "Node binding" link on the left panel
And the user selects the data table of left panel
And the user selects search cell with header: "Reference"
And the user adds the text "API_V_ZAVVTEXTRA" in selected cell and hits enter key
And the user selects cell with text: "API_V_ZAVVTEXTRA" and column header: "Reference"

steps.name: And the user clicks on the selected cell
And the user clicks the "Validation" button in the header
Then the modal dialog "Nodes binding generation" is displayed
When the user selects the check box with X3 field name: "APIGEN_DETAIL"
And the user sets the check box to unticked
And the user clicks the "OK" button in the header
Then an alert box with the text containing "This will generate and/or overwrite data in the binding dictionary. Do you want to continue?" appears
When the user clicks the "Ok" option in the alert box
And the user waits 10 seconds
Then an alert box with the text containing "Number of errors 1" appears
When the user clicks the "Ok" option in the alert box
Then a log panel appears
When the user selects the main log panel of the page
And the user sets rows in log panel to display to 1000
Then the selected log panel includes the message "Could not find a unique index for view ZAVVTEXTRA and node TranslatableTextsView."
And the user clicks the "Close page" main action button on the right panel
And the user clicks the "Close page" main action button on the right panel
And the user removes the lock entry "LCK_GESANODEB"
